name: Memories Of A Spirit
description:
This game was made as a submission for the Cultural Heritage Game Jam

Play as a spirit visiting their village in west Africa and solving puzzles.

Can be played with a keyboard or a controller.

Controls Keyboard:

E: Interact (can be use to take back items from robots)

ZQSD: Movement

Arrows or mouse: Camera

Space: Jump

Controls Controller:

Left Button: Interact (can be use to take back items from robots)

Down Button: Jump

Left stick: Movement

Right stick: Camera
